name: RocketBoy
description:
Hello everyone!

This demo was produced in order to apply all the knowledge I have learned in C # and Unity courses. At the moment I am just a student who does not work in the area.

 I ask for patience in the bugs found in the middle of the demo.

Thankful!

Shift Left: Runs and accumulates strength

Arrows:  Move and climb

Space Bar: Jump

B :  Attacks

Esc: Pause
